name: PowerBIPermissions
description: Sets or refreshes permissions for a workspace.
author: bguidinger

inputs.name: Connection
inputs.label: Power BI connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The service connection to Power BI.

inputs.name: Workspace
inputs.label: Workspace
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID or name of the workspace.
inputs.visibleRule: Action = Add || Action = Remove || Action = Update

inputs.name: PrincipalType
inputs.label: Principal Type
inputs.visibleRule: Action = Add || Action = Remove || Action = Update

inputs.name: Principal
inputs.label: Principal
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID or email address of the principal.
inputs.visibleRule: Action = Add || Action = Remove || Action = Update

inputs.name: Permission
inputs.label: Permission
inputs.visibleRule: Action = Add || Action = Remove || Action = Update
